  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.cli.io.support.FileSystemResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource

    public class FileSystemResource
extends Object
implements Resource
    Based on Spring FileSystemResource implementation.

    28.12.2003
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller, Graeme Rocher
